programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: This action-packed drama as a grieving special force member whose investigation of the triads exposes the involvement of a corrupt cop.

programme.title: My Kung Fu Sweetheart
programme.desc: Phoenix's parents are secret martial arts heroes ferreting out evildoers. Phoenix gets the chance to train in the misty mountains, where she learns of her all-important romantic destiny.

programme.title: The Exodus
programme.desc: A low-ranking cop discovers a group of women, including his superior, Madam Fong and his wife, plotting to eliminate the world of men.

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: Each city has their own navigators that help solve relationship issues in this chaotic world. Chen & Guan are legendary navigators, but problem arises after they decided to help a girl named Xiao Yu.

programme.title: Flashover
programme.desc: Based on a true story, an earthquake causes the gas pipes in an industrial park to break, resulting in explosions & fires in the area. Firefighters must fight to safeguard lives, including their own.

programme.title: Inner Senses
programme.desc: Haunted by recurring visions stemming from past traumas, Yan seeks help from psychiatrist Dr Jim. As she heals, Jim is haunted by the same disturbances when his suppressed memories resurface.

programme.title: Death Stranding
programme.desc: The Police and gambling association team up to overhaul underground gambling by auctioning new casino licenses. This unveils the hidden interests and secrets while sparking conflicts between gangs...

programme.title: The Wig
programme.desc: Meng Zhong is a successful lawyer. During an investigation into a court case, he meets a girl who triggers his memories of a rainy night, revealing a long-hidden secret from 20 years ago...

programme.title: Confinement
programme.desc: A pregnant painter hires a confinement nanny, but inexplicable incidents start happening in the house as her one-month confinement begins, threatening her and her baby daughter...

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: When a luxury hotel in Hong Kong suddenly becomes a Coronavirus superspreader, guests & the staff are faced with a 14-day trial they may not survive.

programme.title: The Secret Diary of a Mom-To-Be
programme.desc: Carmen, who works at a PR company, has no intention of having children and is enjoying married life. Yet, what happens when she suddenly finds herself pregnant?

programme.title: Chasing The Dragon: The One Billion Insp
programme.desc: Hong Kong is facing a rise in corruption & rookie cop Xu Le is demoted when he offends an inspector. It is when Xu Le changes his belief that he eventually becomes a legendary detective.

programme.title: Coffin Homes
programme.desc: Three tales merges in this satire set against Hong Kong's housing crisis, where soaring property prices have driven people to desperate measures - including sharing a space with the dead!

programme.title: Ha Ha Ha Happy New Year!!
programme.desc: Business tycoon Duan accidentally loses his memory. As he is cared for by a temple owner, Duan discovers that he has been replaced by a doppelganger, prompting him to uncover a shocking hidden secret.

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau 3
programme.desc: The latest sequel to the action-comedy FROM VEGAS to MACAU brings Andy Lau & Jacky Cheung back in a power-packed new tale.

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: Three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists on dinner together every night, but tensions rises when their girlfriends join the table.

programme.title: The Monkey King 2
programme.desc: Aaron Kwok plays the Monkey King alongside Gong Li's White Bone Spirit in this powerful sequel to the 2014 box office hit.

programme.title: I Love Hong Kong 2013
programme.desc: Sung Chi Hung and Ha Shek Lam were best friends before they fell in love with the same girl and became rivals. Many years later, Ha becomes a real estate tycoon and is determined to strike back...

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learned boxing since young & uses his skills to help the weak. When his friend is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge to help him take revenge.

programme.title: Over My Dead Body
programme.desc: When an unidentified corpse is found at a residential unit, the residents fear that its presence will turn their home into an ill-fated house, leading to a chaotic endeavor to remove the body.

programme.title: The Monkey King 3
programme.desc: The Queen of Female Kingdom falls in love with Monk Tang, but her advisor orders Monk Tang and his disciples to be killed. As the River Spirit appears, the kingdom is plunged into crisis!

programme.title: Marrying Mr. Perfect
programme.desc: Heartbroken after a breakup, a woman meets a rich tycoon who is under disguise as his driver to escape his conflict. They fall in love soon after, with her completely ignorant of his true identity.

programme.title: The Italian Recipe
programme.desc: Celebrity Peng travels to Rome for the shooting of a reality show and encounters an ordinary girl, Man Man, who dreams of becoming a great chef after migrating to Italy.

programme.title: May We Chat
programme.desc: Dealing with the controversial issues of youth and sex, this film captures how three young women struggle to find a balance between reality and their ideals.

programme.title: American Dreams In China
programme.desc: Co-produced & directed by Peter Chan, starring Huang Xiao Ming, Deng Chao & Tong Da Wei, three undergraduates are brought together by a common ambition - to live the American dream.
